title: Clems Fashion
description: Clems Fashion is an ecommerce website

title: Silicon Voyage Admin Dashboard
description: Powerful tool designed to streamline content management and website administration. It empowers administrators to efficiently handle product specifications, user reviews, and overall website performance, ensuring a seamless and up-to-date user experience.

title: Rate My Professor
description: Designed to help students in evaluating their professors and offering valuable feedback through an intuitive interface, enabling students to rate professors based on teaching effectiveness, course engagement, and communication skills. Beyond numerical ratings, students can provide detailed insights, fostering a culture of constructive criticism

title: Silicon Voyage
description: A technology website that archives specifications for various lines of products in the Tech sector i.e CPUs, GPUs, and Smartphones

title: Twitter card validator
description: Web-based tool that allows users to input their website URLs and validate the associated Twitter cards.
